note:
I'm a Mountain Leader (IML and WML) and wildlife guide. I work mainly in Scotland and the Lake District, as well as overseas. I live on Isle of Arran

I'm also an otter groupie, seabird fan, cyclist, would-be runner and sporadic climber. Sometimes I'm even to be found in a kayak. I live with my husband Wally and two furballs called Nuis 🐕 and Mango 🐱.

I toot about my life, my work, and love to boost stuff about nature, especially the geekier stuff.

She/Her
